programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: Orders up
programme.desc: Business is good and Chai Raja is grinning wider with each ring of the cash register. His mood gets a further lift as a guy in a black suit (an agent) enters with a briefcase marked Top Secret. As Sundar delivers tea to the agent, he is intrigued by the briefcase. Basha chooses to make off with the snacks of the customer at the adjacent table at that very minute. Sundar leaps at Basha and in his hurry upsets the agents plate and tea, knocking down the briefcase. Chai Raja is immediately at agents side, apologizing- he absently picks the briefcase back up(not noticing a fallen plate-like device) and gives it to the agent. The annoyed agent leaves and Sundar gets extra chores as punishment. Basha cant help taunt Sundar as he is stuck doing the chores- In a fit of anger, Sundar chases Basha back into the hotel and randomly hurls the plate like device. Before the chase can continue though, Sundar is sharply reprimanded and hauled off by Chai Raja. Basha meanwhile finds the object that Sundar had just thrown a tad bizarre and pokes around. Lo! It turns out to be a gadget that can make just about anything levitate! Chuckling impishly, Basha sets off towards the hotel, gadget at ready intent on helping Sundar get every order UP! The chaos gets out of hand when Basha sends the device into overdrive and is himself lifted off and bounced around. In the end however, the agent returns and reclaims the device much to the relief of all who drop back down.

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: Space Ride
programme.desc: Don and Colonel stare at the moon maps and rockets. And along with Charly Marly and Lary, their rocket leaps out from earth and into outerspace. Meteors flash past and they land on a new planet, will they ever make it back to earth again???

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: Fly Away Nino
programme.desc: Nino and Mewmew are making paper planes, but as Mewmew didn’t follow all the instructions Nino’s flies so well and much farther. And not just Nino, the twins too have fun seeing their planes fly so well. But no matter how much Mewmew tries it doesn’t fly like the planes of the others. Mewmew wishes her planes flew too so she asks Deedee to work some magic for her. So Deedee casts an ‘all day flying’ spell onto Mewmew’s plane but Nino comes in-between and gets hit by the spell on his helmet. Now Nino can’t stop flying and zooms away all over Abra-Dabra. He flies so wildly that he send Mayor De Pfeffle for a spin after knocking over his flower display. Nino is sorry for being so carried away that he tries to land, but to his surprise the helmet keeps pulling him skyward. Charlie tries weighing Nino down with his heavy mail bag, but the helmet is too strong for even Charlie to grab a hold of that Nino is flung away higher and farther. Nino promises to deliver the mail, much to the happiness of Charlie who can get a much deserved nap for all the effort. So begins Abra-Dabra’s very own first ‘air’-mail courtesy of Nino. Deedee comes up with a plan to help the ‘jet-lagged’ Nino after being inspired by the paper planes Mewmew makes. She shouts out to Nino to use a long sheet of paper from the mail bag and make a plane ‘Mewmew style’ with the wings pointing downwards. The plan works and Nino is able to fly right into Mewmew’s house and the magic wears-off as the sun sets in Abra-Dabra. In all the fuss Mewmew understands what made her planes not to fly, which actually helped Nino come down, and makes her paper planes fly so well now, thanks to Deedee.

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: THE DRILL GRILL
programme.desc: Construction workers leave the plot near to the hotel leaving behind their drilling machine. In the crowded hotel while Sundar is busy serving customers a loud whining sound bothers everyone. Its Basha who has found a new innovative way to be an instigator. He drills the ground with a huge drilling machine just to grill Sundar. As expected, a mad chase ensues where Basha is coming up with hilarious ideas using the drilling machine he is drilling into the earth and popping up in the tea shop stealing stuff, he is making the entire glass almirah filled with snacks vanish right underground, he jumps on the drilling machine like a jumping jack snatching food from the customers, he even makes the customer vanish underground only to throw them back minus their food. Things go haywire with a screaming Sundar chasing him. And when at last when Sundar procures the drilling machine, he trying to switch it off makes the entire hotel collapse standing proudly right in front of Chai Raja. God save Sundar!

programme.title: The Red Shoes
programme.desc: Poor Girl GoGo loses her mother one day. GoGo is adopted by her rich grandmother WI-Go. In the midst of luxurious but strict life, GoGo receives a pair of Red Shoes against her grandmothers rules.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: The Boy Who Cried Wolf
programme.desc: The shepherd boy is bored of uneventfully peaceful days. One day, he gets an idea for a prank - to lie about seeing a wolf to his village people.

programme.title: KALAI-TEA-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is organizing a Kathakali performance in front of his teashop for a group of special guests in the evening. The Kathakali dancer is in the shop enjoying tea and snacks. In the crazy fight between Sundar and Basha, the dancers both legs gets bandaged and he runs away from the shop. Chai Raja catches Sundar in the act! Chai Raja is so angry and panicking. He decides that Sundar is going to dance Kathakali! Next we see a poor Sundar all dressed up in the Kathakali costume with his snout sticking out. The performance starts and Sundar doesnt know what to do. The naughty Basha still has no plans to leave poor Sundaralone. He tries to trips, tickle, push and irritate Sundar from the rafter of the stage. Sundar is running all over the stage musch to Bashas delight and Chai Rajas horror. But the special guests love Sundars performance and awards him with a trophy! Basha is stunnedand Sundar is thrilled beyond words!

programme.title: CHAI MEIN HAADI
programme.desc: Sundar during his break time eagerly goes outside, digs up a bone which he has stored there, kisses it and happily brings it to his tent inside the hotel. He is about to lick it when an angry Chai Raja snatches it and throws it away warning Sundar never to touch it. Though utterly disappointed, the obedient Sundar decides to forget about the bone. But the naughty Basha who sees this charade has no plans of leaving it. What follows is an endless chain of event when the bone pops up all over the teashop in the customers vada, in Chai Rajas tea tumbler, on the kitchen counter, on Chai Rajas head and in Sundars mouth. And poor Sundar is getting it hard from Chai Raja. The entire episode is about Sundar trying everything possible to get the god-forsaken bone out of the tea shop. But it backfires every single time!

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: I Love My Family the Most
programme.desc: A boy who likes to swim falls into the sea and sinks. There are many delicious foods in the fairy castle in the sea that saved the boy, but the boy misses his family on land.

programme.title: Beach Boys
programme.desc: The sun shining bright up in the sky, what a perfect day to laze around on the beach! But the beach boys are in for some mean surprises! Stolen picnic baskets, flying sandwiches, mixed up sun tan lotions and shark attacks.

programme.title: Friendfest Festival
programme.desc: Friendfest is about to be ruined when the Smighties get the Switcherozee Surprise from the Villains and switch personalities. They get the ultimate lesson in friendship when theyl learn to appreciate each other and defeat Sneevil and Biggs.

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: Catch the Wave
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: TEA TO TANGO
programme.desc: Basha arrives at the hotel ready to stack up his belly with fritters, but the said organ of his flips like a pancake when he sees the most bewitching of female primates sitting with her owner at Chai Rajas tea shop. Basha is all set to sweep her off her dainty hairy feet but minutes before that Sundar, fumbling one of his deliveries trips on Chai Rajas new jackfruit dessert and ends up doing a complicated tappangutthumove ; which as fate would have it sits absolutely in tune with the music that played on the radio. The female monkey who until now looked comatose jerks to rapturous attention. She cant take her eyes off Sundar. Basha horrified at this unexpected attention-switch tries some classy Tango to woo her. Sundar though slightly irritated by the fawning female monkey, is amused at Bashas frustration there begins an impromptu dance off between Sundar and Basha. Sadly for Basha, all the suave leaps and twists dont seem to impress the damsel of his dreams. Sundar too is in danger of facing flak from Chai Raja for delivering more tappangutthuthan tea! Sundar knowingly trips up letting Basha win the affections of the lady finally...and a pleasant surprise from Basha awaits Sundar as he drags feet to wash the dishes!

programme.title: POT BOILER
programme.desc: Chai Rajas normal kettle is sent in for repair and Chai Raja, very hesitantly brings out the antique kettle that is his inheritance from his great granddad. With extreme care and caution (and reverence), he sets about making tea, but then there is a sudden visit by the politician who demands that Chai Raja sit with him to discuss about tea provision for the upcoming elections. Chai Raja cant refuse and Sundar has to take on the task of tea making while Chai Raja sits with the politician. Sundar, knowing Chai Rajas affections for the special kettle handles it with kid gloves but he doesnt anticipate Basha poking his tail in and thats when mayhem ensues. As Chai Raja glares intermittently from afar, Sundar desperately tries to keep the pot boiling without melting it up altogether. He is however distracted by the customers who dont much seem to like the taste of tea being served that day. Basha takes advantage of Sundars distraction and flicks the kettle. Sundar desperately tries to get it back. He lunges and manages to yank Basha by his tail, but this only sends the ancient kettle flying. Later we see Chai Raja tearfully hang up a new wind-chime (made of pieces of his antique kettle) and then glare at Sundar who has been assigned a tower of dishes to wash. Basha sniggers in the distance, blowing into the spout of the kettle, whistling the chai chaitune!

programme.title: Bubble Cars
programme.desc: As Deedee and Nino were wondering what Charlie got the twins for their birthday, Sandy whizzes past in a brand new pedal car. Boris got one too, but he doesn’t want his to get dirty at all. So he decides not to use it at all even though he misses all the fun Sandy is having. Mewmew and Sandy even have a race across town. Boris even declines a chance to race, but is entirely sceptical about it as he doesn’t even want a splash of mud to fall on it. He is even more worried when he sees Sandy’s car not working. Deedee tries to help by magically trying to create a bubble guard around Boris’s car, but the spell falls on Sandy’s car instead. Now no one can even touch the car, let alone repair it. Boris vouches to allow Sandy use his car as he acknowledges that it was his undoing that led to the creation of the bubble in the first place. Sandy is overjoyed and promises to be extra careful. So careful that Mewmew can even beat her by running on his ears. Deedee tells Boris to prove to Sandy that she can use the car faster, so Boris races with Mewmew and accidentally splashes mud over his face, but then is happy he does and enjoys the fun. He races so fast that he pops the bubble guard over Sandy’s car by crashing into it. Charlie sets down to fix the cars and the twins are driving them in a jiffy, giggling all the way.

programme.title: Planet Gadget
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Python Problem
programme.desc: Don is trimming the hedge and humming to himself and guess what slithers out from between the bush. A python. And this is no ordinary python, he can beat up Colonel, drive a truck with its tail, stay alive in the fridge and lots more.

programme.title: The gift
programme.desc: Yo, Yo, Ragoo and the young boy Theo are invited to Pandora, the princess’s party. Theo’s allergic to peanuts, but, not knowing, Pandora’s made a peanut butter cake for him.

programme.title: Don In Pain
programme.desc: Don happens to eat a ‘metallic hot dog’ which gave him a bad tooth. Now he wants it removed. Colonel tries everything possible. Even the rats come to offer their ‘help’. But that tooth just refuses to leave his mouth. At last, they are at the dentist’s and it is all funny and hilarious!

programme.title: Honor Code
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Happy ending
programme.desc: The twins jump into a story and find out that the characters are stuck, because the last pages of the book are missing. So the twins invent the ending themselves, discovering the power of imagination, and when they go back home they understand they can create a new recipe with the ingredients they’ve got.

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Things change!
programme.desc: Yo and Yo meet Tim, who is sad because his cuckoo clock has retired and has been replaced by a cute young alarm clock.

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: The Golden Fish
programme.desc: Fisherman GoGo catches the scarce golden fish, I-Go, but frees her. To repay for GoGos kindness, I-Go promises to grant his wishes, and Gogo wishes his greedy wife, WI-Gos longing to be rich.

programme.title: The liquorice touch
programme.desc: The twins encounter Liquorice, a girl who turns everything she touches into something sweet. After a moment of enthusiasm they discover that she is not so happy about her talent

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Better Than You
programme.desc: Pancake must come to terms with not being better at something than his little sister Maple, which is mirrored in the Zooniverse when he tries to help the Zoonicorns build Jiggly Stone wall. Even when you’re not the best at something, you can always be helpful.

programme.title: Sideways Day
programme.desc: Odessa learns to accept Pancake’s idea over her own when she joins the Zoonicorns in Sideways Day.Accepting other’s ideas even if they’re different from your own.

programme.title: KING SCUMWORM
programme.desc: Peng’s carelessness leads to the Ninjas fighting their way out of the nest of a huge (but dopey) parasitic monarch.

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: Afraid of the dark
programme.desc: In a northerly winter world, the twins meet a snowman who is afraid of the dark -- and too scared to travel through the night to enjoy the Northern Lights with his friends.

programme.title: Clothespin
programme.desc: What can Hepi and Briko make with. Clothes pin? Lets find out!

programme.title: The house of the talking objects
programme.desc: The twins look for Ragoo in a fantasy house where objects are alive and don’t like humans, until the twins take care of a door that won’t open

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: DANCE DOJO
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to master dancing, much to Xia’s annoyance. April teaches Xia a move that he uses to defeat a Worm Monster and to earn his mondojitsu Brown Socks.

programme.title: Tiggy’s Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he’s not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee’s magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy’s and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn’t get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: I want To Ride The Sled
programme.desc: Duda visits Scot who is busy with his snow sleigh. Duda wants to take a ride on the sleigh but Scot refuses to share. So Duda makes his own sled and takes it on his next expedition with Dada, Caber, and Bubble. However, due to Dudas antics, Pinkar crashes and they end up stranded in a hot desert with a flat tire and an empty gas tank. Back in the Unknown Forest, Piggy, Puggy and Scot decide to go after them so Scot can show off his awesome sleigh. Meanwhile, Duda and his friends take turns riding his sleigh. After watching Duda ride his sleigh in the sand, Dada gets the idea and needs nothing more than Scots help to get home. Will the friends be able to escape the desert safely?

programme.title: A strange Footprint
programme.desc: Bubbles reads a story about scary monsters to Doubt and Caber. Duda finds her funny, but Caber is really scared. The next morning, Bubbles finds a giant footprint in the ground. Doubt and Caber thinks a monster did it, but Bubbles and Dad tell them that monsters dont exist. Hearing all the commotion about monsters, Scot decides to dress up as one and scare everyone for fun. When he tries to scare Duda, things dont go as planned. Instead of being afraid, Duda is excited to meet the "monster." Duda chases the "monster" up a tree, but soon discovers that he is just a Scotsman in disguise. Suddenly, something falls from the tree! Scot runs away, screaming that he is a real monster. Maybe monsters really exist...

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Baghdad in Bloom
programme.desc: Aladdin buys magic seeds from the market with the food money believing the plant will bring him riches. However when it doesnt grow he and Jamillah enlist Genie to help, he does his thing and suddenly the plant grows! Everyone in town hears about the plant and comes to see it in Aladdins garden - hoping that they too will get blessed with riches. Even the Sultan comes to see its beauty. The crowd waits with bated breath but when it opens - it stinks like smelly cheese. The crowd disperse but the Sultan is transfixed by the rare scent. He sees the value and beauty in it where others dont and gives Aladdin gold in exchange for the plant.

programme.title: Smile Like An Angel
programme.desc: Duda y sus amigos deciden hacer pareja para ir a una expedición. Scot sugiere hacer una votación y el amigo que no sea elegido tiene que ser socio de un espantapájaros. Desafortunadamente para Scot, termina con el espantapájaros. De vuelta a casa, Scot se pregunta por qué es tan impopular. Con un poco de ayuda de Piggy and Puggy y su invento el Smile Ha-ha, Scot se transforma en un "ángel sonriente" y hace que los hermanos búho anuncien a todo el mundo su nueva y mejorada personalidad. Duda corre a Scot para verlo por sí mismo, y termina causando estragos en el escondite de Scot. Scot casi explota de rabia y le ordena a Duda que se vaya. Sorprendentemente, Duda le dice a todo el mundo lo agradable y divertido que era Scot y todos aparecen en la puerta de Scot. ¿Conseguirá Scot finalmente un compañero para la próxima expedición?

programme.title: Pizza Mania
programme.desc: Dunky has made pizza and gives one slice to each of them. Cat likes the pizza so much that he do not want to share the balance pizza with Keet.

programme.title: Rock- N- Roll Don
programme.desc: It is chaos and war in the house. And in the middle of this, Don gets hold of a guitar. He sprouts a new passion- music! But for all others it is unbearable. They try everything possible to stop Don, in vain. Things go global when Colonel joins the team with his drums!! Noise pollution it is…

programme.title: Neighbour Watch
programme.desc: There is a beautiful new girl in the neighbourhood. Everyone from the rat trio to Don to Colonel to King Chomp is bewitched by her. Now the place is all about wooing and flirting and fighting for the pretty betty. But there is a naughty twist in the story when a new guys lands. Who is it???

programme.title: The Magical Flying Horse
programme.desc: The spoilt nephew of the Grand Vizier comes to town and there is a competition to make the boy who has everything something to make him smile for his birthday. When Jamillah asks him what he wants, he asks for a flying horse! Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie do their best to make a flying horse but its beyond Genies powers. In the end Jamillah saves the day by making the boy an origami paper horse with wings that makes him smile.

programme.title: Royal Egg – Ugly Duckling
programme.desc: Everybody knows the story of the UGLY DUCKLING: the adventures and misadventures of a little swan that is born far from his family and is mocked and rejected by everyone. But nobody knows how the swan’s egg ended up in a duck’s nest. In this episode, SANDRA and FO have to resolve this mystery, having been called out by the parents of the UGLY DUCKLING, two swans who are the KING and QUEEEN of the birds. SANDRA will manage to thwart a plot to kill the “Ugly Duckling”, the prince of birds.

programme.title: Baby On Loose
programme.desc: One fine day, Don finds a baby at his doorstep. But with the rats around, it is indeed a mission for don and colonel to keep the baby safe. Will the dogs keep the baby safe? What twist could possibly happen?

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: The Red Button
programme.desc: Fred insists Brains let him watch over her lab while she visits her father’s Space Station. She agrees under one rule: “Don’t press the red button.” The entire time she’s gone, he can think of nothing else.

programme.title: Silly Cat
programme.desc: Cat does nothing but just watches tv and lazes on the sofa. And has messed up the tv room with spilled water and popcorn and all things upside down.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time Part 1
programme.desc: Jamillah arrives in Baghdad for the first time accidently squashing Aladdins eggs causing him to bump into Mustafa, the market trader, and ruin all of his stock. Mustafa wants Aladdin to pay or go to jail but Aladdin has no money and therefore no choice but to go to jail! Can Jamillah and Aladdin think of a way to get him out?

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Imagine Dragons
programme.desc: Maple learns the power of imagination when she imagines a dragon in the Zooniverse, and it goes out-of-control!. Learn to think things through.

programme.title: Carrotade
programme.desc: Fred Dad Simon is excited about his new invention, a disgusting drink with “the power of 500 carrots!” Fred fakes drinking it, and commands Friday into a phony weight-lifting machine, which convinces kids at school that the drink works. Instead, the drink turns kids skin orange, making them very appetizing to Brains’ latest foe, the Carniverous Carniborgs!

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Ámame como soy
programme.desc: Dasha, una rica chica mimada, pierda la memoria en un accidente planeado por su novio y su mejor amiga.

programme.title: Ámame como soy
programme.desc: Dasha, una rica chica mimada, pierda la memoria en un accidente planeado por su novio y su mejor amiga.

programme.title: Ámame como soy
programme.desc: Dasha, una rica chica mimada, pierda la memoria en un accidente planeado por su novio y su mejor amiga.

programme.title: Contra viento y marea
programme.desc: Tras pasar siete años en la cárcel por asesinato, Dina logra demostrar su inocencia y obtener su libertad.

programme.title: Contra viento y marea
programme.desc: Tras pasar siete años en la cárcel por asesinato, Dina logra demostrar su inocencia y obtener su libertad.

programme.title: American Thought Leaders
programme.desc: Featuring in-depth discussions with some of America's most influential thought leaders.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Kalbi Dalili
programme.desc: Director: Ismail Farouk - Cast: Sameh Hussein /Mai Kassab - Year of production: 2013

programme.title: Boshkash
programme.desc: Director: Ahmed Yousry - Cast: Mohamed Saad / Zeina - Year of production: 2008

programme.title: Khiyana Mashroua
programme.desc: Director: Hadi Bagoury - Cast: Hani Salama /Somua Al kashab- Year of production: 2006

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: The Draft Horse 1942
programme.desc: A farm horse tries to enlist in the army, but despite his virtuoso display of wartime histrionics, he's rejected when he flunks the physical. Dejected, he wanders into a mock battlefield, which tells him what war is really like.

programme.title: A Haunting we Will Go 1949
programme.desc: Casper the Friendly Ghost, sad that he can make no friends since everyone he meets is afraid of him, hatches an abandoned egg and becomes the emerging little duck's best friend and protector.

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: Raiders of Galaxy 1982
programme.desc: A group of young space cadets use a technologically advanced mecha to combat an evil extraterrestrial race that is trying to take over the galaxy

programme.title: Popeye Meets Sinbad the Sailor 1936
programme.desc: The legendary sailors Popeye and Sindbad do battle to see which one is the greatest.

programme.title: Betty Boop- Whoops! I'm a Cowboy-1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop's runt of a suitor thinks he'll have better luck if he takes cowboy lessons at a dude ranch; slapstick results.

programme.title: Jungle Drums- 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple

programme.title: Baby Buggy Bunny 1954
programme.desc: Baby-faced Finster robs a bank, but the baby carriage with the money in it goes down Bugs' rabbit hole.

programme.title: Quack a Doodle Doo 1950
programme.desc: His Mama is the only one who love Baby Huey, an overgrown clumsy ugly duckling. The other Mamas and their broods shun him like the plague and make his little life miserable. But when a ferocious fox attacks the barnyard, Huey comes to the rescue of one and all. Huey is a hero basking in his new-found popularity. First of the series.

programme.title: spooking about africa 2 (1080)
programme.desc: Casper is in an African jungle. He frightens a zebra at a watering hole. Wheezy the elephant has a terrible sneezing problem; he sneezes all the feathers off a peacock and a group of monkeys out of their perches. Casper decides to help, and in the process dislodges the feather that was making the elephant sneeze. But then a fire breaks out, and the elephant is unable to sneeze on command

programme.title: Little Boy Blue 1936
programme.desc: The Big Bad Wolf stalks Little Bo Peep and steals one of her sheep. She enlists Little Boy Blue and a dancing scarecrow to assist her and her mischievous black sheep in rescuing it. Singing, dancing, hilarity and impalement ensue.

programme.title: The Mechanical Monsters 1941
programme.desc: Superman battles a criminal mastermind and his robot army.

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939
programme.desc: A hen adopts an abandoned egg which hatches into a turtle. The baby turtle becomes the butt of all the real chicks' jokes until danger threatens

programme.title: Assault and Flattery 1956
programme.desc: Bluto is accusing Popeye in judge Wimpy's courtroom. Bluto tells a sad tale of how Popeye attacked him without provocation, but Popeye tells his side, in detail (in other words, a large chunk of _Balmy Swami, A (1949)_)

programme.title: Out to Punch 1956
programme.desc: Popeye's training for his boxing match with Bluto by jumping rope with a massive chain. Bluto, who's lazy about everything except sabotage, decides he needs to stop Popeye. He fills Popeye's heavy bag with iron junk, but Popeye punches it over the fence onto Bluto. Next, he pulls on the springs attached to the wall with a motorcycle, but Popeye pulls so hard he throws Bluto and the cycle through the building and into a well. Popeye is walking -- or actually, prancing -- behind Olive on the way to the match, so Bluto tries a bit more sabotage: first an oil slick, which slows Popeye down briefly, then some quick-dry cement in a puddle. This gives Popeye cement overshoes, and when he gets to the arena, he's exhausted. Olive stands him up, but Bluto treats him like a punching bag. He's got Popeye on the floor (under the ring), so Olive finally breaks out the spinach. Popeye knocks Bluto through the roof, right into the hospital. The photographers ask for a picture, and Popeye's biceps form the words

programme.title: Betty Boop's Museum
programme.desc: Koko takes Betty to the museum, where she's locked in overnight and forced to sing at the skeletons' dance

programme.title: Molly Moo-Cow and the Indians-1935
programme.desc: A Native American hunter tries to hunt two ducks. A cow saves them, so the hunter goes after the cow

programme.title: The Property Man 1916
programme.desc: Charlie has trouble with actors' luggage and conflicts over who gets the star's dressing room. There are further difficulties with frequent scene changes, wrong entries and a fireman's hose. At one point he juggles an athlete's supposed weights. The humor is still rough: he kicks an older assistant in the face and allows him to be run over by a truck

programme.title: Caught in a Cabaret 1914
programme.desc: Charlie is a clumsy waiter in a cheap cabaret and must endure the strict orders from his boss. He meets a pretty girl in the park and pretends to be a fancy ambassador but must contend with the jealousy of her fiancé.

programme.title: His Musical Career-1914
programme.desc: Charlie and his partner are to deliver a piano to 666 Prospect St. and repossess one from 999 Prospect St. They confuse the addresses. The difficulties of delivering the piano by mule cart, and most of the specific gags, appeared later in Laurel and Hardy's "The Music Box".

programme.title: Eternally Yours-1939
programme.desc: Anita Halstead, swept off her feet by magician Arturo, finds the results less than magical.

programme.title: Kid Auto Races at Venice 1914
programme.desc: The Tramp wanders into and disrupts the filming of a go-kart race.

programme.title: The Greeks Had a Word for Them-1932
programme.desc: In this sophisticated comedy Jazz Age comedy, a trio of money-hungry women all have sugar daddies who keep them in the lap of luxury, even as they drive the men crazy. Each woman represents a different personality type, from sensitive, to kind-hearted, to difficult and untrustworthy. The twenties come roaring back with immorality and in-fighting

programme.title: Those Love Pangs -1914
programme.desc: Charlie and a rival vie for the favors of their landlady. In the park they each fall for different girls, though Charlie's has a male friend already. Charlie considers suicide, is talked out of it by a policeman, and later throws his girl's friend into the lake. Frightened, the girls go off to a movie. Charlie shows up there and flirts with them. Later both rivals substitute themselves for the girls and attack the unwitting Charlie. In an audience-wide fight, Charlie is tossed through the screen.

programme.title: The Jack Benny Christmas Show 1961
programme.desc: In The Jack Benny Christmas Show, holiday cheer meets classic comedy as Jack Benny brings his trademark wit to a festive television special. Joined by his regular cast and surprise guests, Benny’s dry humor and perfectly timed gags light up the season with laughter. Blending sketches, music, and holiday spirit, this variety show captures the warmth and fun of Christmas in true Jack Benny style.

programme.title: The Littlest Angel 1969
programme.desc: In The Littlest Angel, the beloved holiday story comes to life in a touching musical special. Jerry Skinner stars as a small boy who enters heaven but struggles to fit in among the angels. Longing for the simple joys of his earthly life, he offers a humble gift that becomes the most treasured of all. With heartfelt songs, tender performances, and a timeless message of love and faith, this family favorite captures the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Candyland "The Bon Bon Parade" 1935
programme.desc: In The Bon Bon Parade, Walter Lantz delivers a sweet animated fantasy where candy comes to life in a whimsical parade of music and color. Chocolate soldiers march, peppermint sticks dance, and bonbons whirl in a dazzling display of imagination. With playful gags, lively animation, and a sugar-sprinkled sense of fun, this short film serves up a delightful treat for audiences young and old.

programme.title: Joseph and His Brethren 1961
programme.desc: In Joseph and His Brethren, the timeless biblical story comes to life in a sweeping tale of betrayal, faith, and forgiveness. Beloved by his father but despised by his jealous brothers, Joseph is sold into slavery and carried off to Egypt. Rising from servant to trusted advisor through courage and faith, he faces temptation, injustice, and trials that test his spirit. With powerful performances and epic scope, this historical drama retells one of the Bible’s most inspiring journeys of resilience and redemption.

programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a boy who can communicate with his dog telepathically is targeted by a mysterious committee.

programme.title: A Bucket Of Blood
programme.desc: A dimwitted busboy at a beatnik cafe passes off a cat he accidentally killed and covered in plaster as a sculpture, prompting a demand for more art that compels him to commit murders.

programme.title: Nightmare Castle
programme.desc: A woman and her lover are tortured and killed by her sadistic husband. The pair return from the grave to seek vengeance.

programme.title: The Boss Cowboy
programme.desc: Both Nolan and Ross are losing cattle and Ross' foreman Kerns is the culprit. When Taylor finds a wanted poster of Kerns he goes after him.

programme.title: Raiders of Red Gap 1943
programme.desc: In Raiders of Red Gap, the Range Busters ride into action when a ruthless gang plots to seize control of a frontier town. Crash Corrigan, Dusty King, and Alibi Terhune team up to outwit the outlaws with fast guns, daring stunts, and plenty of grit. With danger around every corner—and a touch of Alibi’s trademark humor—this action-packed Western gallops straight into classic Range Busters territory.

programme.title: Gunfighters of the Old West

programme.desc: Jacob grapples with his true heritage, touch relationships, and a pivotal career choice amid family turmoil.

programme.desc: NOMADslow.tv is an atmospheric travel channel, a stream of consciousness designed to transform screen time into a meditative, cinematic experience.

programme.desc: NOMADslow.tv is an atmospheric travel channel, a stream of consciousness designed to transform screen time into a meditative, cinematic experience.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co.
programme.desc: In this episode, Dave, Noah, and Connor unveil the first-ever Creekside Cigar Club shipment, highlighting their authentic approach to curating boxes filled only with cigars they genuinely smoke and love, rather than random selections or discounted items. The March box features five "killer" cigars: the versatile Rodriguez Reserva Privada, the naturally sweet Serino Wayfarer 109, the balanced Crown Heads Coroneta Habano, the intensely cinnamon and pepper Aganorsa Leaf Rare Leaf Reserve Corojo, and the full-bodied, sweet Habano-like Domain Neutron. They express gratitude to their growing community of subscribers and emphasize their commitment to supporting the people and brands that make the cigar industry special.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: Join Brian and Chris on Burn Rate as they delve into the highly sought-after Aganorsa Rare Leaf Reserve cigar. These seasoned tobacco experts will meticulously analyze the unique blend and construction, offering their insights on the distinct flavors and overall smoking experience. Discover if this "rare leaf" lives up to its reputation and earns the coveted Burn Rate seal of approval.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join us as we take a behind the scenes tour of Florida's largest independent tobacco farm. Jeff Borysiewicz guides us through his tobacco farm, sharing tricks of the trade and everything that goes into the process of producing high quality cigar tobacco.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this episode of Behind the Blend, Sean sits down with Jack Heyer, the product manager for Camacho cigars, who shares his journey from being a cigar enthusiast to working for his favorite company, Davidoff, under the Camacho brand. Jack discusses the Camacho Triple Maduro cigar, noting its unique all-Maduro blend, which took 84 tries to perfect, and its long-standing popularity as the company's second-best-selling cigar. He also touches on the brand's successful 2013 rebrand, which aimed to make their cigars more visually appealing and approachable to a new generation of smokers, while maintaining the high quality and consistency that Davidoff is known for.

programme.title: Privada Masterclass
programme.desc: In this episode of our cigar masterclass, we focus on the prefactory stage of cigar making, where the journey of tobacco takes shape before it reaches the rolling table. From harvesting the finest leaves to curing and fermentation, we‚Äôll explore the meticulous processes that prepare tobacco for its transformation into premium cigars.

programme.title: The Cigar Guys Podcast
programme.desc: Explore the world of cigar smoking laws with The Cigar Guys as they uncover the sensible, the strange, and the outright quirky. Find out how global regulations stack up and which ones leave you scratching your head!

programme.desc: Coming to you live from the Drew Estate Experience Acid Studios in Florida. Our guest tonight is Founders Cigar

Being as stealthy as possible Trav and Cheese are able to sneak into 15 yards of the bear and make a great shot. Trav then heads to the kitchen to make a delicious bear ham with the entire hind quarter

programme.title: Late Season Horseback Bulls - Part 1

programme.desc: After a bunch of thieves are sent out to hunt for urban legends by a wealthy man intending to open a museum full of mythical creatures. Soon, the thieves will learn the legend of a Leprechaun...

programme.desc: When a group of Americans travels to Russian Siberia to honor the memory of their murdered friend, they uncover a plot that threatens all their lives...

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: El Gavilán Justiciero
programme.desc: Historia llena de acción donde la codicia y la ambición desatan la más cruenta lucha, que trae como consecuencia el sufrimiento de una familia y la envidia de otra.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: El Mundo Es Tuyo
programme.desc: El cartel más poderoso ha puesto sus reglas y deben respetarse, la regla principal del patrón es prohibir los secuestros en la plaza. El comandante Ántrax es el encargado de hacer cumplir las órdenes del señor.

programme.title: Abolición De La Propiedad
programme.desc: En un sótano oscuro, Norma escucha su voz y la de Everio en una vieja grabadora Ampex. Cada que él vuelve a bajar, la detiene. Han estado platicándose sus vidas, varias veces las conversaciones grabadas terminan coincidiendo con las charlas que ellos sostienen. Lo que le preocupa a Norma es que hasta ese día no conocía a Everio y lo último que escuchó fue que él la ahorcaba.

programme.title: El Deseo de Domingo
programme.desc: Narra la historia de Domingo, un adulto mayor que sufre Alzheimer y pasa sus días en un geriátrico en la ciudad de Viedma, desde donde intenta, a toda costa, viajar a la Capital, a San Isidro, a ver el gran premio de turf Carlos Pellegrini. Pero claro, no se trata de cualquier premio, sino el del año 1952. Para eso necesitará de la ayuda de Marcelo, su nieto, quien se encuentra en el dilema de conformarse con su puesto en una dependencia pública o seguir luchando por triunfar con su banda de rock. …

programme.title: Call TV
programme.desc: Lucía, una actriz en decadencia, acepta presentar un programa nocturno de preguntas tontas. Sin darse cuenta de que se ha metido en un gran lío que le hará pasar la peor noche de su vida

programme.title: 72 Horas Para Morir
programme.desc: Su madre lo dejo en manos de su padre siendo un niño y el lo preparo para ser un gatillero y hacerse cargo del territorio de Texas, por eso lo apodan el Texano. Un día en la calle se encuentra con una mujer y ella le adivina su futuro, le dice que tiene 72 horas para morir... el texano no lo cree pero algo muy malo esta por suceder.

programme.title: Vigilia
programme.desc: Santiago amanece desnudo y golpeado en medio del desierto. El joven se incorpora muy aturdido y retorna a su casa paterna. En el campo, su familia está padeciendo una gran sequía. Su padre Ernesto, lo recibe a punta de pistola mientras que su perro Arón lo protege imponiéndose amenazante contra su padre. Ernesto decide, en contra de la voluntad de su hijo, sacrificar al perro familiar que se ha vuelto cimarrón. Arón, el perro sacrificado, emerge de su tumba y sus fantasmagóricas apariciones amenazan la cordura de Ernesto y sacuden los cimientos de la familia, que queda a merced de sus impulsos salvajes.

programme.title: Soy Una Buena Persona
programme.desc: Sabina es una treintañera muy "artista" convencida de que podrá algún día vivir de su arte como diseñadora, actriz, guionista o directora, porque ella está destinada a petarlo. Mientras, como casi toda su generación, malvive gorroneando en casa de sus padres. Pero una noche tiene, por desgracia ajena, una oportunidad de lujo... y no dudará en aprovecharla sin pensárselo demasiado.

programme.title: Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief
programme.desc: The belief that we need something other than God is what keeps us from going through breakthroughs. That’s how we can be in covenant with God but still in captivity. In “Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us break up with what’s been holding us back.

programme.title: Rescue Your Testimony
programme.desc: Pastor Steven Furtick helps us deal with disappointment and revive our hope in “Rescue Your Testimony.” You’ll be encouraged to tell your story through the lens of God’s faithfulness.

programme.title: Reverse The Ripple
programme.desc: An event is not your identity. In “Reverse The Ripple,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us go back to the source of what we’re going through so we can begin to write a new story for our lives.

programme.title: Do the New You
programme.desc: In “Do The New You,” Pastor Steven reminds us that God has given us the decision to remain the same or grow into who He has created us to be.
